note.title: Discussion Venues
note.t: Discussion of this document takes place on the RATS Working Group mailing list (rats@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/rats/.
Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/ietf-rats-wg/tpm-based-network-device-attestation.
